txt.en: This weapon is dull, but not worn. It looks old, but ceremonial. Perhaps you should collect a few more and bring them to the Rangers at Tinnudir?
'These are in much worse shape than I could have hoped. Time and the goblins have not been kind to them. Hopefully, we can still glean some value from them.'
'Ancient ceremonial weapons may prove more important than our modern functional weapons. A strange though indeed...'
Tham Andalath is the furthest of the estates from Tinnudir. What was once one of the most opulent houses in all of Evendim is now desecrated by goblins.
Tham Andalath is north-east of Tinnudir and east of Tham Ornen.\n\nYou found a ceremonial weapon in Tham Andalath and believe you should gather more to take to the Rangers of Tinnudir.
Bring the ornamental blades to the Rangers at Tinnudir
The Rangers are at Tinnudir, south-west of Tham Andalath.\n\nOne of the Rangers will be eager to examine the ceremonial blades you found.
